mapper.select: select menu_seqno, s_se, menu_name, menu_price, menu_ex, menu_img, menu_cal from menu where s_se=#{param1} order by menu_seqno
select menu_name, menu_price, menu_ex, menu_img, menu_cal from menu where menu_seqno=#{param1} and s_se=#{param2}
mapper.update: update menu set menu_name=#{param1}, menu_price=#{param2}, menu_ex=#{param3}, menu_img=#{param4}, menu_cal=#{param5} where menu_seqno=#{param6} and s_se=#{param7}
mapper.delete: delete from menu where menu_seqno=#{param1} and s_se=#{param2}
